action.action-desc: Mr. Carter of Georgia introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to require U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement, upon the request of a law enforcement official, to make a prompt determination of whether to issue a detainer in the case of an alien arrested for a violation of Federal, State, or local law.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Assuring Law Enforcement Requests Are Timely Evaluated by the Department of Homeland Security Act of 2015 or the ALERTED Act of 2015.
Section 287(d) of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1357(d)) is amended in the matter preceding paragraph (1), by striking relating to controlled substances.
